text: Shadows and Sunshine is a 1916 American silent drama film directed by Henry King and starring Marie Osborne, Leon Pardue and Lucy Payton.Guide to the Silent Years of American Cinema p.165 ==Cast== * Marie Osborne as Little Mary * Leon Pardue as Shadows * Lucy Payton as Little Mary's Mother * Daniel Gilfether as Gilbert Jackson * Mollie McConnell as Amelia Jackson * R.
